- [Who We Are](https://chisipocon.local/who-we-are/) - About Chisipo Consultants Engineering Excellence Since 1998 Delivering innovative and sustainable engineering solutions across Zimbabwe and beyond. who we are Committed to Superior Quality & Timely Solutions! Chisipo Consultants (Pvt) Ltd is a Zimbabwean-owned multi-disciplinary consulting engineering firm established in 1998. For more than 25 years, we have provided professional services in civil, structural, electrical, Chisipo Consultants is a trusted Zimbabwean engineering firm since 1998, delivering civil, structural, electrical, and mechanical solutions nationwide.
- [What We Do](https://chisipocon.local/what-we-do/) - our services Engineering Excellence. Delivering Reliable, Sustainable, & Innovative Solutions. At Chisipo Consultants, we deliver end-to-end engineering consultancy services across multiple disciplines — from concept design to construction supervision. Our integrated approach ensures each project is functional, durable, efficient, and environmentally responsible.
